mapper.select: SELECT send_time AS "sendTime", verification_code AS "verificationCode" FROM verification_log WHERE recipient = #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY send_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO verification_log ( recipient, send_time, content, verification_code ) VALUES ( #{recipient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verificationCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
